mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.type AS "type", a.source AS "source", a.head_image_url AS "headImageUrl", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.recommend_uid AS "recommendUid", a.score AS "score", a.gold AS "gold", a.vip_time AS "vipTime", a.created AS "created"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO td_memeber( id, mobile, nick_name, type, source, head_image_url, channel_id, channel_name, recommend_uid, score, gold, vip_time, created ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mobile}, #{nickName}, #{type}, #{source}, #{headImageUrl}, #{channelId}, #{channelName}, #{recommendUid}, #{score}, #{gold}, #{vipTime}, #{created} )
mapper.update: UPDATE td_memeber SET mobile = #{mobile}, nick_name = #{nickName}, type = #{type}, source = #{source}, head_image_url = #{headImageUrl}, channel_id = #{channelId}, channel_name = #{channelName}, recommend_uid = #{recommendUid}, score = #{score}, gold = #{gold}, vip_time = #{vipTime}, created = #{created} WHERE id = #{id}
